reviews.text: There are plenty of parking spaces, checking in was fast and good. The hotel lobby personnel can speak good English even during late hours in the evening.
reviews.title: Just OK... but not sure if I want to come back.

reviews.title: Excellent hotel, good location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom has a rain shower, but the water pressure cannot support it. It was more like a rain drop shower.
reviews.title: We loved our stay

reviews.text: The bathroom can be cleaned in a better way.
reviews.title: Great Hotel and Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: OH, and the heating was put very very warm, but luckily you can open the balcony window to get some fresh air, which I did. I couldn't manage to turn down the heating the shower room though.
reviews.title: Dreary Hotel On Outskirts of Parma

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed overnight while passing through to go to Rome. It was adequate for that purpose but did not seem to be in an ideal location for touring the heart of Parma which we did not attempt to do because of snow. The free breakfast buffet and free WiFi made up for the less than great location. The self serve breakfast buffet was quite good. They have a coffee machine. They served eggs, bacon, ham, cheese, pastries, rolls, juice, etc.
reviews.title: Good breakfast buffet

reviews.text: I stayed here as the usual hotel was fully booked. The hotel was clean but room very basic. It was warm, but equally I could open the balcony door, if required. If you were short then you would struggle to see out of the balcony due to the height of the wall. I did not like the shower as there was hardly any pressure so difficult to wash my hair. I ate in the restaurant in the evening, but it was quite clinical with just a few single diners. The food was good, as was the breakfast in the morning.
reviews.title: Very Average

reviews.text: Polite staff, beautiful hotel, great service. I look forward to visiting this hotel again.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: I have now stayed here 3 times on business and found the hotel clean and organised.
reviews.title: Good business traveller / short break hotel

reviews.text: The staff are all generally friendly (one, the night porter not so much).
reviews.title: Warm hospitality

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel with my family of four during our Christmas vacations' trip in Emiglia Romana. The room was very big and comfortable and the position of the hotel was very convenient for having quick access to the motorway. The hotel is a bit far from the city center of Parma, but this was not a problem for us, since the schedule of our trip was to travel all around the area with our car. The breakfast was very good, with a very big variety of options, including delicious local products, like prosciutto and Parmesan cheese. The hotel restaurant was also convenient, with a bit small portions though... Concluding, I would definitely suggest this hotel to a family with small kids.
reviews.title: x-mas family vacations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for just 1 night. We were of course attracted by the low price. I normally prefer a 4* Hotel outside the center to a 2* hotel in the center. But next time I might opt for a hotel inside the center. The hotel is about 40 minutes walking distance from the center of Parma - so I would only recommend to those who have a car. We were assigned a room on the main floor next to the elevator. Unnecessary to say that our sleep quality was not very good. The room was ok, but nothing special. there was a balcony showing against a wall, the bed was a pull-down bed, never seen before in a hotel. Due to this fact, the lights on the bed table didn't give you enough light to read. Furthermore the main light was not working, which meant we had to go ahead with only 2 small lights. The bathroom was nicely furnished, but that was it. The shower curtain was disgusting and also the shower was not as relaxing as it promised to be. but the biggest problem was, that there was a lot of noise coming from the bathroom due to other rooms flushing toilets or having a shower. Furthermore there was a bad taste coming out of the bathroom.
reviews.title: ok for short-break

reviews.text: Breakfast made up for the not-so nice room. There was a good choice and service was very nice. No problems with check-in and check-out, nice entry-hall.
reviews.title: Choose another hotel

reviews.text: Parma is a beautiful city and we will absolutely be back. But next time we will be looking into something closer to the center.
reviews.title: Cosy Place

reviews.text: I chose this hotel because it was described as City Centre. The good things at the hotel were the reception staff (except one) were excellent and helpful. The breakfast was very good indeed - wide choice and fresh produce.
reviews.title: Very helpful personnel, good location, fair rooms

reviews.text: I first found this hotel in March and now stay at this hotel at least 8 nights per month, the staff are very friendly which is one of the reasons I return here.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Value for Money, Friendly staff

reviews.text: Rooms are comfortable, free wifi, mini bar is useful
reviews.title: Jersey Girl

reviews.title: Great service...

reviews.title: Hotel in Parma Great for Business or Family Stay

You Will discover the flavors of our local cuisine with the care and craftsmanship of our Chefs without neglecting the international cuisine.Breakfast are amazing thanks to the collaboration with the cafeteria by Lino’s Coffee.In our bright lobby Features an LCD TV to news 24 hours, There is a business area with free WIFI, a fitness area and free bike rental.We are Pet friendly, So your small animals are Welcome here.
